description: A quick win: understand The Cannon-Bard Theory.

hook.text: Walter Cannon disagreed with James. He said emotion and body response happen at the same time, not in sequence.

buildup.text: Cannon-Bard theory says the thalamus sends signals to the cortex and body simultaneously.

climax.text: Cannon-Bard shifted the debate: emotion isn't just body reading ‚Äî the brain plays an independent role.

punchline.text: The feeling and the body respond together, not one after the other.
